nutrition.goal: Optimize dietary intake to support joint health and reduce inflammation, while maintaining a balanced and nutrient-dense diet
nutrition.frequency: Weekly sessions for the first 6 weeks, then bi-weekly check-ins
content: Increase intake of anti-inflammatory foods (e.g., fatty fish, nuts, seeds, and leafy greens) to reduce joint inflammation (Adequacy)
Balance macronutrient intake to support muscle strength and joint health (Balance)
Monitor and manage calorie intake to maintain a healthy weight (Calorie control)

psychology.goal: Enhance coping strategies and improve emotional well-being to manage knee pain and functional limitations
psychology.frequency: Weekly sessions for the first 8 weeks, then bi-weekly sessions
content: Motivational interviewing to enhance motivation and commitment to rehabilitation (Motivational interviewing)
CBT restructuring to address negative thoughts and beliefs about knee pain and function (CBT restructuring)
Digital mindfulness prompts to reduce stress and improve overall well-being (Digital mindfulness prompts)
